name: Malicious Script Execution Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a PowerShell script executed via a phishing email led to a remote connection to a command-and-control server.

parallel--2a79bcb8-0283-4e8f-bd5d-22c37b.name: Mitigation Actions
parallel--2a79bcb8-0283-4e8f-bd5d-22c37b.description: Execute multiple mitigation actions in parallel.

action--1ac1b220-4a39-4fb5-b2ee-b719ee6a.name: Kill malicious process
action--1ac1b220-4a39-4fb5-b2ee-b719ee6a.description: Terminate the malicious process running on the affected host.

action--2bc2c826-5d7f-40cf-b7b0-cbb6179b.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--2bc2c826-5d7f-40cf-b7b0-cbb6179b.description: Shut down the network interface of the affected host to prevent further communication.

action--43e07338-b39f-4aca-a906-40e54056.name: Perform malware scan on the affected host
action--43e07338-b39f-4aca-a906-40e54056.description: Initiate a malware scan on the affected host and repeat until no threats are found.

loop--b0b9c0a6-6722-4c97-8d3b-fb65b450ef.name: Repeat malware scan until clean
loop--b0b9c0a6-6722-4c97-8d3b-fb65b450ef.description: Continue scanning the host until it is confirmed clean of malware.
